description: A VS Code extension to detect and fix non-baseline web features.

baseline-sentinel.hideGitHubSetup.description: Hide the GitHub Actions setup prompt.

baseline-sentinel.autoSyncEnabled.description: Automatically check GitHub Actions for new scan results every 2 minutes.

baseline-sentinel.githubToken.description: GitHub Personal Access Token for auto-sync (stored securely).

baseline-sentinel.autoSendReportOnSave.description: Automatically send scan report to LLM chat when a file with issues is saved (for vibe coders).

baseline-sentinel.openaiApiKey.description: OpenAI API Key for AI-powered report generation (optional). Get yours at https://platform.openai.com/api-keys

baseline-sentinel.useOpenAIReports.description: Use OpenAI to enhance reports with beautiful visuals and clear language. Disable for faster, standard reports.
